title: Queen Elizabeth II 'reluctantly' accepts medical advice to rest, cancels Northern Ireland visit
content:
1. Queen Elizabeth II 'reluctantly' accepts medical advice to rest, cancels Northern Ireland visit  The Washington Post
  2. Queen cancels Northern Ireland trip on 'medical advice'  The Independent
  3. Queen cancels Northern Ireland visit on medical advice  BBC News
  4. Queen Elizabeth II cancels trip on advice to rest for a few days  CNN
  5. Queen Elizabeth 'Reluctantly' Accepts Doctors Orders to Rest: Buckingham Palace  The Daily Beast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: エリザベス2世、医師からの休養勧告を不本意ながら受け入れ、北アイルランド訪問を中止
英国女王伊丽莎白二世 "不情愿 "地接受医疗建议进行休息，取消对北爱尔兰的访问
英國女王伊麗莎白二世 "不情願 "地接受醫療建議進行休息，取消對北愛爾蘭的訪問
